text:
@bbcquestiontime @DavidLammy @nadhimzahawi David Lammy is right and Nadim is wrong - the UK is 2nd only to the US for the number of deaths from #COVID19 and higher than the US per capita...

#bbcqt https://t.co/W7vQKJlSpi
